answers.answer: My bp was all over the place. I finally called the doc cos my hands were swelling and my legs felt stiff. My bp was 140/104 he put me on bed rest at home. After blood work and urine analysis, he said i have pre-e. He put me on bed rest at home for 2 more weeks til i deliver the baby with 2 weekly check ups to monitor my condition. U shouldn't be up and moving around. Especially if u r getting headaches. If your doc put u on meds than ur pre-e is pretty serious...well not mild. If i were u, i would call the doc office with every symptom til he puts u on bed rest or get a second opinion. U don't wanna do damage to yourself or the baby. Good luck

I am 30weeks 5days now, and they found out I have pre-eclampsia at about 23 weeks. Have been hospitalized 3 times since then. Also on 2 meds for my blood pressure. Seeing my Dr again tomorrow.Worried they might want to do a csection soon...
Oh and I also have very bad headaches and nausea, some swelling and pain in my muscles. I also don't have any energy.Good luck, I know it is not fun, but take care of yourself and baby.

I did and was watched from about 33 weeks and on. If the meds are doing what they should and lower your pressure you should be fine. I was dropping like +2 and they never seemed crazy worried. Was put on bed rest at 36 weeks till they set an induction date at 38 weeks 1 day. I delivered vaginally at 38 weeks 2 days.

question: Anybody experiencing preeclampsia at 33 weeks? My blood pressure is on and off but my doctor doesn't feel worried as much as I am? I've already received the steroids IM and my headache is super annoying all day long and taking two blood pressure medications, I'm super surprised he hasn't put me on bed rest or taken me out of work??
title: preeclampsia
